article.name: meek
article.contents: Meek is a state where a creature's Charisma is severely weakened. They suffer: - Disadvantage to all Charisma rolls - On turn start, if they have suffered any damage, they become demoralized. There is a 50% chance they spend their turn attempting to seek safety, rather than continuing to fight. - Their maximum Mana is reduced to 50%. Track current Mana as Max Mana - Mana consumed. - When using powers, they cannot use abilities or modifiers that require spending any extra Mana above the normal cost.
article.bodyHtml:
Meek is a state where a creature's Charisma is severely weakened. They suffer:

  • Disadvantage to all Charisma rolls
  • On turn start, if they have suffered any damage, they become demoralized. There is a 50% chance they spend their turn attempting to seek safety, rather than continuing to fight.
  • Their maximum Mana is reduced to 50%. Track current Mana as Max Mana - Mana consumed.
  • When using powers, they cannot use abilities or modifiers that require spending any extra Mana above the normal cost.
